data.actual_result: A message from Clyde appears informing the user that they have to share a server with the user to send the message.
data.expected_result: The "You cannot send messages over 2k characters" pop up should appear.
data.short_description: Sending text that is over the 2k limit with custom emojis or mentions shows an incorrect error from Clyde.
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy the Lorem Ipsum text from below - Change the channel mentions to any valid channels in your server - Send the message
